about_the_game: Wear the Retro Prisoner Skin Collection, a new cosmetic set for your player, weapons, and gear.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description: Wear the Retro Prisoner Skin Collection, a new cosmetic set for your player, weapons, and gear.

name: The Callisto Protocol - Retro Prisoner Skin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300X or Intel Core i5-7400
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700

short_description: Wear the Retro Prisoner Skin Collection, a new cosmetic set for your player, weapons, and gear.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
